verses.plain: Do no evil, so shall no harm come unto thee.

tokens.t: Do no evil, so shall no harm come unto thee.

verses.plain: Depart from the unjust, and iniquity shall turn away from thee.

tokens.t: Depart from the unjust, and iniquity shall turn away from thee.

verses.plain: My son, sow not upon the furrows of unrighteousness, and thou shalt not reap them sevenfold.

tokens.t: My son, sow not upon the furrows of unrighteousness, and thou shalt not reap them sevenfold.

verses.plain: Seek not of the Lord preeminence, neither of the king the seat of honour.

tokens.t: Seek not of the Lord preeminence, neither of the king the seat of honour.

verses.plain: justify not thyself before the Lord; and boast not of thy wisdom before the king.

tokens.t: justify not thyself before the Lord; and boast not of thy wisdom before the king.

verses.plain: Seek not to be judge, being not able to take away iniquity; lest at any time thou fear the person of the mighty, an stumblingblock in the way of thy uprightness.

tokens.t: Seek not to be judge, being not able to take away iniquity; lest at any time thou fear the person of the mighty, an stumblingblock in the way of thy uprightness.

verses.plain: Offend not against the multitude of a city, and then thou shalt not cast thyself down among the people.

tokens.t: Offend not against the multitude of a city, and then thou shalt not cast thyself down among the people.

verses.plain: Bind not one sin upon another; for in one thou shalt not be unpunished.

tokens.t: Bind not one sin upon another; for in one thou shalt not be unpunished.

verses.plain: Say not, God will look upon the multitude of my oblations, and when I offer to the most high God, he will accept it.

tokens.t: Say not, God will look upon the multitude of my oblations, and when I offer to the most high God, he will accept it.

verses.plain: Be not fainthearted when thou makest thy prayer, and neglect not to give alms.

tokens.t: Be not fainthearted when thou makest thy prayer, and neglect not to give alms.

verses.plain: Laugh no man to scorn in the bitterness of his soul: for there is one which humbleth and exalteth.

tokens.t: Laugh no man to scorn in the bitterness of his soul: for there is one which humbleth and exalteth.

verses.plain: Devise not a lie against thy brother; neither do the like to thy friend.

tokens.t: Devise not a lie against thy brother; neither do the like to thy friend.

verses.plain: Use not to make any manner of lie: for the custom thereof is not good.

tokens.t: Use not to make any manner of lie: for the custom thereof is not good.

verses.plain: Use not many words in a multitude of elders, and make not much babbling when thou prayest.

tokens.t: Use not many words in a multitude of elders, and make not much babbling when thou prayest.

verses.plain: Hate not laborious work, neither husbandry, which the most High hath ordained.

tokens.t: Hate not laborious work, neither husbandry, which the most High hath ordained.

verses.plain: Number not thyself among the multitude of sinners, but remember that wrath will not tarry long.

tokens.t: Number not thyself among the multitude of sinners, but remember that wrath will not tarry long.

verses.plain: Humble thyself greatly: for the vengeance of the ungodly is fire and worms.

tokens.t: Humble thyself greatly: for the vengeance of the ungodly is fire and worms.

verses.plain: Change not a friend for any good by no means; neither a faithful brother for the gold of Ophir.

tokens.t: Change not a friend for any good by no means; neither a faithful brother for the gold of Ophir.

verses.plain: Forego not a wise and good woman: for her grace is above gold.

tokens.t: Forego not a wise and good woman: for her grace is above gold.

verses.plain: Whereas thy servant worketh truly, entreat him not evil, nor the hireling that bestoweth himself wholly for thee.

tokens.t: Whereas thy servant worketh truly, entreat him not evil, nor the hireling that bestoweth himself wholly for thee.

verses.plain: Let thy soul love a good servant, and defraud him not of liberty.

tokens.t: Let thy soul love a good servant, and defraud him not of liberty.

verses.plain: Hast thou cattle? have an eye to them: and if they be for thy profit, keep them with thee.

tokens.t: Hast thou cattle? have an eye to them: and if they be for thy profit, keep them with thee.

verses.plain: Hast thou children? instruct them, and bow down their neck from their youth.

tokens.t: Hast thou children? instruct them, and bow down their neck from their youth.

verses.plain: Hast thou daughters? have a care of their body, and shew not thyself cheerful toward them.

tokens.t: Hast thou daughters? have a care of their body, and shew not thyself cheerful toward them.

verses.plain: Marry thy daughter, and so shalt thou have performed a weighty matter: but give her to a man of understanding.

tokens.t: Marry thy daughter, and so shalt thou have performed a weighty matter: but give her to a man of understanding.

verses.plain: Hast thou a wife after thy mind? forsake her not: but give not thyself over to a light woman.

tokens.t: Hast thou a wife after thy mind? forsake her not: but give not thyself over to a light woman.

verses.plain: Honour thy father with thy whole heart, and forget not the sorrows of thy mother.

tokens.t: Honour thy father with thy whole heart, and forget not the sorrows of thy mother.

verses.plain: Remember that thou wast begotten of them; and how canst thou recompense them the things that they have done for thee?

tokens.t: Remember that thou wast begotten of them; and how canst thou recompense them the things that they have done for thee?

verses.plain: Fear the Lord with all thy soul, and reverence his priests.

tokens.t: Fear the Lord with all thy soul, and reverence his priests.

verses.plain: Love him that made thee with all thy strength, and forsake not his ministers.

tokens.t: Love him that made thee with all thy strength, and forsake not his ministers.

verses.plain: Fear the Lord, and honor the priest; and give him his portion, as it is commanded thee; the firstfruits, and the trespass offering, and the gift of the shoulders, and the sacrifice of sanctification, and the firstfruits of the holy things.

tokens.t: Fear the Lord, and honor the priest; and give him his portion, as it is commanded thee; the firstfruits, and the trespass offering, and the gift of the shoulders, and the sacrifice of sanctification, and the firstfruits of the holy things.

verses.plain: And stretch thine hand unto the poor, that thy blessing may be perfected.

tokens.t: And stretch thine hand unto the poor, that thy blessing may be perfected.

verses.plain: A gift hath grace in the sight of every man living; and for the dead detain it not.

tokens.t: A gift hath grace in the sight of every man living; and for the dead detain it not.

verses.plain: Fail not to be with them that weep, and mourn with them that mourn.

tokens.t: Fail not to be with them that weep, and mourn with them that mourn.

verses.plain: Be not slow to visit the sick: for that shall make thee to be beloved.

tokens.t: Be not slow to visit the sick: for that shall make thee to be beloved.

verses.plain: Whatsoever thou takest in hand, remember the end, and thou shalt never do amiss.

tokens.t: Whatsoever thou takest in hand, remember the end, and thou shalt never do amiss.
